Pension pots (defined contribution schemes)

Enter the current values of any pension pots you have - money saved through workplace or personal pension schemes over the course of your career.

A pension pot (sometimes called a defined contribution pension scheme)
builds up a sum of money using your contributions, your employer's
contributions (if applicable), contributions from the government in the form
of tax relief plus investment returns.
